By Julian Baker

LONDON, Dec 2 (IFR) - abrdn plc (Ticker: ABDNLN) has mandated Barclays, BofA Securities, HSBC and J.P. Morgan Cazenove as Joint Lead Managers, to organise a series of fixed income investor calls commencing on Thursday 2 December 2021.

A GBP200m (expected) Perp-NC-5.5 Fixed Rate Reset Perpetual Subordinated Additional Tier 1 Contingent Convertible transaction will follow, subject to market conditions. The notes will feature principal loss absorption in the form of contingent equity conversion, are expected to be rated Baa2 / BBB- by Moody’s / S&P and will be in Reg S Registered format. FCA / ICMA stabilisation applies.
